Sentencas: In this paper, a control-oriented model of a solid oxide fuel cell system is formulated and analyzed in detail.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: First, a lumped model based on first principle laws is formulated and tuned using experimental data coming from a real solid oxide fuel cell system test bench.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The model calibration is carried out based on an optimization approach to minimize the error between the experimental data and the model one.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: To systematically analyze the system behavior, an equilibrium point analysis is formulated and developed.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The analysis results show the maximum steady-state electrical power under each constant stack temperature.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: This will allow to appropriately select operation points during the system operation.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Secondly, Lyapunov's theory is used to characterize the local stability of the equilibrium points.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The results show that the equilibrium points are locally stable.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Besides, comparison between the initial nonlinear model with the linearized model is performed to show the efficacy of the linearised model analysis.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Finally, the frequency response of the linearized model is performed.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: This analysis provides key information about control system design in order to efficiently operate the solid oxide fuel cell system.
Titulo: Control-oriented modelling and analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell system
